name: Womadz
overview:
Womadz hosts online video contests on behalf of your brand. We work with you to build fully customized contest pages to enable a seamless transition between your website and your Womadz contest.

To source original content we invite our community of filmmakers to upload videos to your customized contest page. We work with your company to create a briefing that focuses the contest submissions.

In order to prove the content and maximize its spread we employ a unique incentive system that encourages the public to vote on their favorite videos and share them with their friends. Our system makes watching your ads the consumer’s intended focus rather than an unwelcome interruption; people choose to watch them, they are not forced to endure them.

For a fraction of the price of a traditional ad campaign, through Womadz you can engage your consumers, obtain valuable analytics on viewer tastes, and spread consumer-selected content in a highly effective manner.
